segments.text: How do you feel about this restaurant ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What did you enjoy the most ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I enjoyed the fish the most .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The fish was pretty special , but I loved the dessert .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really felt that the service was exceptionally good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , the service really added to the experience .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am looking forward to returning to this restaurant .
segments.speaker: S2
